content:
In Singapore, there are several agencies that focus on research related to ear and hearing problems:

1. National University of Singapore (NUS)
2. Duke-NUS Medical School
3. Singapore General Hospital (SGH)
4. KK Women's and Children's Hospital (KKH)
5. National University Health System (NUHS)

These agencies have dedicated departments and research centers that focus on various aspects of ear and hearing problems, such as hearing loss, tinnitus, balance disorders, and cochlear implantation. Some of these agencies also have clinical services that provide diagnostic and treatment services for patients with ear and hearing problems. These agencies often collaborate with international partners to conduct joint research projects in the field of ear and hearing problems.
